page.title: 07MORETON COMMUNITY ASSOC. (l)
page.content:
The M.C.A. had long felt there was a need for a Centre to serve the Moreton area. They had held a local survey which had substantiated their opinion, and, under the aegis of the Manpower Services Commission, the go ahead was given. Premises were provided in unused classrooms at Lingham Primary School and in l983 the Centre was opened.
The Centre now has a staff of l2 and these are some of the regular activities that take place each week: Playgroup, Morris Dancing, Mother and Child Club, Pensioners' Luncheon Club, Sequence Dancing, Break Dancing, Birchwood School of Dancing and Keep Fit.
